yatiyanthota - ke. ke. di. rupasinha yatiyanthota, thanakolawaththa, ayilawaththe kalani ganga haraha idikirimata salasum kara thibu palama sadime katayuthu atharamaga nawathi wasara kipayak gathawi athath, me pilibandawa nisi piyawarak noganima nisa kawulalanda, kahatapanawa, ayilawa, ayilawa waththa, udabagewaththa pradeshawala pawul dahas gananak dadi dushkarathawata pathwa atha.
